name: FurAffinity - Dark Matte 2.0
description:
An updated version of FurAffinity - Dark Matte, a style which is no longer updated.
Includes a handful of fixes and will hopefully be kept up to date. (and you can always message me on FurAffinity.net if you would like to help make this style better)

Featured in Firefox - PimpUigi Edition.
http://hardforum.com/showthread.php?t=1641786
additional_info: Credit goes to user 43068 for his style 25766
